text: Satan a nguazir kamɨn godɨn ifavarim, a gumazir kabar nɨghnɨziba mɨtatem dagh anɨngizɨma, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim puvatɨ. Ezɨ kamaghɨn Kraisɨn akar aghuimɨn angazangarim ko an apangkuvim men navir averiabar aven ghuava avenge. Kamaghɨn, me Krais deragha an garir puvatɨ, a uabɨ Godɨn mɨrara itir nedazim.
